services.Summary: Interfaces between 1GX and GoA business applications.
services.Description:
The 1GX Application Programming Interface (API) Service provides Government of Alberta (GoA) business areas with multiple interfaces between 1GX modules and their business applications. It provides them with the ability to search, create, update, and delete records in real time, directly from their business applications, without accessing 1GX directly.

This service must be requested by 1GX ministry service managers, as they are responsible for the integrations between 1GX and ministry applications. They will work with application developers, the 1GX Centre of Excellence (CoE) team, and the Service Integration team to determine which API(s) will meet business area requirements.

The 1GX CoE team approves requests for this service and collaborates with the Service Integration team to collect the requirements needed to configure API Gateway access and security roles
services.Comments: Requests for this service will only be accepted by your ministry's 1GX Service Manager through a BERNIE RITM.

Contact.details: Advanced request required through BERNIE; search and select the BERNIE service called '1GX API Service'.

services.Summary: Interfaces between 1GX and GoA business applications using legacy IMAGIS format.
services.Description: Interfaces between 1GX and GoA business applications using iSuite to send/receive files in legacy IMAGIS format. This integration is for legacy GoA applications, it will be phased out and replaced by direct API type of integration with 1GX.
services.Comments: This integration is for legacy GoA applications, it will be phased out and replaced by direct API type of integration with 1GX.

Contact.details: Advanced request required through BERNIE; search and select the BERNIE service called '1GX Legacy IMAGIS Integration Service'

services.Summary: A deployment of Keycloak, providing user authentication and authorization services.
services.Description: The Access Service is a deployment of Keycloak, which provides Realms to tenants and serves as the basis for user access management.  As a federated IDP, Keycloak provides user authentication and authorization services, helping you to your tenant secure.  On top of Keycloak, the Access Service provides the user roles necessary to use all other ADSP services.
services.Prerequisites: Product teams can get started by accessing an existing tenant or creating a new tenant. Each tenant represents a zone of administrative control and generally products within a common service area can share a tenant.

services.Summary: Uses incremental "Canada Post" searches to find an address and provide the full address details.
services.Description: Allows ease of mailing address data entry and validation through 2 endpoints that allow incremental searches to find the correct address and provide the full address details of the selected result.  This service leverages "Canada Post - Address Complete" for it's validation repository.
services.Prerequisites: Users will need to submit a Address Validation Service Intake Request to the Service Integration Team via BERNIE "Service Integration Consultation" online form submission to request this service.

Contact.details: Advanced request required through the Service Integration SharePoint site; click the "Service Request Details" link to access 'Service Integration Consultation Request " web form

services.Summary: Provides protection, monitoring and performance metrics for APIs. Can act as a firewall, router & DDOS protection for APIs. Also supports advanced features like "custom claims".
services.Description: Provides protection, monitoring and performance metrics for APIs.  The gateway can act as a firewall, router & DDOS protection for APIs and supports advanced features like "custom claims".  The gateway service is available for both internal/external and on-prem/cloud APIs.  This service leverages the Digital Identiity Gateway for API authentication.
services.Prerequisites: Users will need to submit a API gateway as a service Intake Request to the Service Integration Team via BERNIE "Service Integration Consultation" online form submission to request this service.

Contact.details: Advanced request required through the Service Integration SharePoint site; click the "Service Request Details" link to access 'Service Integration Consultation Request " web form

services.Summary: A guide for developers & QA testers to get started with QA automation within your application.
services.Description:
This is QA automation process outlined for service teams. Developers and QA testers should be able to use this as a guide to get started with QA automation within your application.

This documentation will go over all of the QA automation test frameworks in detail, outline the technology stacks used in this process

services.Summary: Validate financial institution number, branch number, and banking account number format.
services.Description: Allow applications to validate the financial institution number, branch number, as well as the format of the banking account number.

services.Summary: Using Amazon QuickSight visualization tool, create interactive dashboards, paginated reports, and embedded analytics with single source of truth + automate Data Pipelines with a shared architecture pattern.
services.Description:
Justice Digital teams are using Amazon QuickSight as a data visualization tool. With QuickSight, all product teams can meet varying analytic needs from the same source of truth through interactive dashboards, paginated reports, and embedded analytics. 

Product teams are also fully automating their Data Pipelines using a shared architecture pattern.

services.Summary: Schedule events for end users. Front-end calendar widget (daily, weekly, or monthly). Supports persistent events, managing attendees, event queries, and automatic time-zone conversion.
services.Description: Provides the capability for scheduling events like meetings, appointments, or similar activities for your application's end users.  ADSP gives you full backend support for creating persistent events, managing attendees, event queries, and automatic time-zone conversion.  It can be used to populate any front-end calendar widget with daily, weekly, or monthly entries.

The service ensures persistent, and schema-compliant, configuration storage using a JSON document store. Write operations will be validated against the schema for accurate and consistent data.

services.Summary:
Justice staff lookup for metadata, contact information and some court locations.
Justices and Clerks signatures can be applied to documents as required.
services.Description:
The court personnel API allows Justice Digital service/teams to look up metadata, contact information regarding Justices, Judges, Judicial Assistants, Application Judges and their court locations at any point in the service.

Metadata and contact information for Judges, Justices, Judicial assistants, and Application Judges are collected and updated in a single place.

Signatures of Justices and Clerks are managed within the Shared Service and through secure access, can be applied to documents as required.

 The shared service serves as the source of truth for this information, where delegated authorities from the courts update information for all other services and systems to pull from.

services.Summary: A data governance plan outlining processes and procedures to ensure data quality, security, and privacy across all shared services of the Justice Digital Services Platform.
services.Description: The Data Governance Plan outlines the processes and procedures to ensure data quality, security, and privacy across all shared services of the Justice Digital Services Platform. It comprises a set of standard operating procedures (SOPs) aimed at promoting consistency, reliability, and compliance in the handling, management, and modification of shared services.

services.Summary: A design system for designers and developers to create consistent and cohesive user experiences across multiple products and platforms.
services.Description: The Design System team is responsible for creating and maintaining the assets used for building DDD product layouts, interactions, and patterns. The design system is a shared language for designers and developers to create consistent and cohesive user experiences across multiple products and platforms.
services.Version: Web components 1.14.0 , Design tokens 1.1.1 , Angular components 2.5.0 , React components 4.14.0
services.UseCases: A design system is a centralized resource that provides guidelines, assets, and code to help teams build digital products. It helps maintain consistency across multiple projects and allows teams to focus on higher-level tasks rather than reinventing low-level elements.
services.Comments: Include the design system in all DDD products; it should act as the foundation for developing the front-end of any government service.

services.Summary: Provides a central register of service APIs
services.Description: As a central register of APIs, the Directory Service gives you a means for service discovery.  They can use the Directory Service to find service URLs and decouple application code from changes in the URL due to, for example, a newer version, or a change in the application's environment.

services.Description: Provides a number of document manipulation features including:  Mail Merges, PDF Form Filling and PDF Redaction.  This service supports a number of input and output formats (.docx, .xlsx, pdf, etc.)  -->  Enhancement requests can be made for additional features

services.Summary: Allows basic file management of project-specific content within ECM systems (e.g., file creation, modification, metadata, etc.) for OpenText.
services.Description:
The Electronic Content Management (ECM) Connector is a representational state transfer (REST) application programming interface (API) that allows file management of Government of Alberta (GoA) content within ECM systems (e.g. file creation, modification, metadata, etc.).

The ECM Connector takes REST calls and translates them into a format that is understood by the proprietary Open Text LIVELINK web services (LAPI) running on the GoA's OpenText Enterprise Content Servers (ECSS) server.

Contact.details: Advanced request required through BERNIE; search and select the BERNIE service called 'Electronic Content Management (ECM) Connector'

services.Summary: Allows the user to access the platform to create and send envelopes, monitor and administer user activity and manage other aspects of the e-signature business process and workflow.
services.Description:
The eSignature is a cloud-based service that allows subscribers to prepare and send documents for electronic signatures.  With this service, subscribers can send contracts and agreements to both GoA internal and external clients for signatures and approvals.  The service is secure, cost-effective, timesaving, user-friendly, and compliant with GoA guidelines and standards.  The signed documents are protected, and the signers are uniquely identified by using multiple authentication methods.

The following tasks can be performed using this request:

Request a consultation with the eSignature support team
Subscribe to the eSignature service
Add, change, and remove users from your eSignature service subscription
Assign signature projects to users
Cancel the eSignature service subscription
You are encouraged to request a consultation to learn more about the service before subscribing to the service.  During the consultation meeting, you are provided with the service features, costs, and details on the subscription process.

Contact.details: Advanced request required through BERNIE; search and sekect the BERNIE service called "eSignature Service".

services.Summary: A powerful email service with similar or more capabilities than your outlook client.
services.Description: Sends emails to one or many recipients with multiple parameters: To, CC and BCC, ability to specify a FROM recipient, supply a subject line, options for the message body such as HTML, Rich Text or Plain Text, and the sender can attach one or more attachments to the  email.  Provides similar formatting capabilities as your outlook client.

Contact.details: Advanced request required through the Service Integration SharePoint site; click the "Request the service" link and access the 'Service Integration Intake Request' web form

This gives them an easy way to implement traceability, auditability, accountability and transparency.  In addition the service is often coupled, and used in conjunction with, other ADSP services. E.G an application is using the Notification Service it would use specific domain events to trigger notifications.

services.Summary: Notes on OAuth for Browser-Based Apps
services.Description:
This specification details the threats, attack consequences, security considerations and best practices that must be taken into account when developing browser-based applications that use OAuth 2.0.

Pattern to implement OAuth BFF Proxy flow described here
https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/draft-ietf-oauth-browser-based-apps#name-backend-for-frontend-bff-pr
services.Prerequisites: The implementation is using BFF Duende framework, license might be required

services.Summary: A common e-payment service that offers a centralized electronic payment experience.   This service leverage the GoA TD Beanstream platform.
services.Description:
The Payment Gateway Service (PGS) offers a centralized electronic payment experience with the GoA using the TD Online Mart online payments solution. This standardized approach has many advantages over direct integration with current payment providers, such as:  

Application insulation from organizational change. When the payment provider changes, the application code does not. Consequently, PGS can seamlessly manage a new payment provider without manual intervention. 
Business areas no longer have to complete the Payment Card Industry Self-Assessment Questionnaire (PCI SAQ) A type audits.
services.Prerequisites: Business area will require a merchant account for their transactions.  This can be obtained through TBF merchant services (the process to obtain a merchant account is documented as part of the onboarding procedures)

Contact.details: Advanced request required through the Service Integration SharePoint site; click the "Request Payment Gateway Service" link to access the 'Service Integration Consultation Request " web form

The documents are uploaded to Azure Blob storage and can be managed there securely, throughout their lifecycle, with the ADSP file service.

services.Summary: Monitoring the health of applications and services.
services.Description: A service for monitoring the health of applications and other services.  You provide a URL for it to ping and it will notify you, or a webhook, if the response occurs in a timely manner or not.  Additionally, the service provides links to a static web page your users can visit to check on your application's status.  You can configure this page to display status updates and notices for planned maintenance or other outages.

Will enable multiple types of users under one common IAM solution, including citizen, external businesses and organizations and their staff, and internal GoA staff

services.Summary: Module to define release announcements and survey prompts for users and track their responses (Dismissed, Postponed, Acknowledged)
services.Description: Module to define release announcements and survey prompts for users and track their responses (Dismissed, Postponed, Acknowledged)
services.Comments: This is a shared code module which teams deploy independently.  Work is planned to make a microservice deployment.  Actual survey results are stored in external system (ms forms), this only tracks if the user opened the survey.

services.Summary: Provides a temporal-based data store useful for storing such things as event, change, and audit logs.  In addition, it can aggregate KPIs.
services.Description: Provides a temporal-based data store that is useful for storing such things as event, change, and audit logs.  In addition, it can be used to aggregate KPI's over some time interval by including metrics along with each entry.  For example, it has been used to log events along with a count metric, and therefore can be used to show how many events are emitted per unit of time.
services.Prerequisites: Product teams can get started by accessing an existing tenant or creating a new tenant. Each tenant represents a zone of administrative control and generally products within a common service area can share a tenant.

services.Summary: Verify service provides time limited random codes that can be used for validation purposes.
services.Description: Verify service provides time limited random codes that can be used for validation purposes. For example, generated codes can be sent to a user by email and requested from an application to verify user access to the email inbox.
services.Prerequisites: Product teams can get started by accessing an existing tenant or creating a new tenant. Each tenant represents a zone of administrative control and generally products within a common service area can share a tenant.

services.Summary: Efficient error handling & logging service
services.Description:
This error logging service efficiently captures and organizes software errors in real-time, offering a streamlined solution for developers. It adapts to diverse tech stacks and programming languages, ensuring broad compatibility. Custom error handling options allow tailored responses to specific project needs.

With automatic notifications and seamless integration into existing workflows, the service facilitates quick communication and collaboration among development teams. Analytical tools enable teams to identify error trends, monitor resolution progress, and make informed decisions for continuous improvement.

The service prioritizes security, employing robust encryption protocols to protect sensitive error data and ensuring compliance with industry standards. 
It contributes to a proactive development culture, enhancing software reliability and overall system performance.
services.UseCases: To be used application developers for: Application Monitoring, Debugging and Troubleshooting, Performance Optimization, User Experience Enhancement, Compliance and Security, Continuous Improvement and/or Integration Testing.
services.Prerequisites: Your application is installed withing the GOA environment
services.Comments: Reporting is being improved. Check back regularly for updates.
